title: Simple Task Queue
description:
Create a TaskQueue class with:
- LinkedList<String> field named tasks
- Constructor that initializes tasks
- enqueue(String task) method (add to end)
- dequeue() method (remove and return first task, or null if empty)
- size() method
instructions:
Create a TaskQueue class with:
- LinkedList<String> field named tasks
- Constructor that initializes tasks
- enqueue(String task) method (add to end)
- dequeue() method (remove and return first task, or null if empty)
- size() method

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
Use an if statement to check the condition.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
